root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 9-3-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: The Enterprise Surveys are implemented every year in around 20 countries. Data frequency is limited for each country around 4 years. Regional and global averages are thus computed by taking a simple average of country-level point estimates. For each economy, only the latest available year of survey data is used in this computation. Only surveys adhering to the Enterprise Surveys Global Methodology are used to compute these regional and global aggregates.
